stimulusHtml:
The melody will be played three times. There will be a pause of 30 seconds after the first playing and a 1-minute pause after each subsequent playing. There are no rests in the melody you will hear. It will be played on a euphonium.

Now listen to the melody for the first time and begin to note it.

features.html: Notate on the staves provided the correct pitch and rhythm of a short melody that you will hear.
